attributes.additional_details: Millions of dogs and cats are euthanized each year—just for being homeless. Overcrowded shelters, lack of funding, and unchecked breeding leave loving animals with no chance. They deserve homes, not death. We need better solutions like adoption, spaying/neutering, and support for no-kill shelters. Their lives matter.
attributes.background: To reduce/ stop the acts of Euthanasia in animal shelters globally

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Mandate Ethical Rehoming for Lab and Breeding Animals by 2025
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732487
